##### **Transcript**

I'm really excited about all the progress being made with Copilot. In fact, I wanna talk about 3 features that are are becoming daily habits for me. The first one is Hey, Copilot on my Windows laptop. Now I'm working on e-mail or working on a document. And then essentially I have a new mouse. It just happens to be voice. I can just invoke Copilot and ask it questions. It retrieves information and it's just fantastic to have it. It's probably the most exciting new modality since Touch that's been introduced. Hey Copilot. Yeah, I'm here and ready to dive in. What's on your mind today? The second thing that I love is Miko. It's the new character for Copilot. It's great to have a face to talk to when it comes to AI and especially in this live learn mode. It's just so fun. It's a Socratic tutor. My daughter and I had a session run, you know, Egyptian mythology. I asked it about sparse attention. And the cool thing about it is it thought us both what we wanted to know, not just give us information. And it's just wonderful. And the third? A feature that's now becoming an everyday use feature for me is the multi user mode. So now with groups, all my family and friends join a copilot session and we can just jam together with AI and it's really, really fun and really helpful in terms of, you know, planning, learning, coordinating and staying in saying. So I think these three things are definitely becoming my go to features on a daily basis. We are building fast. Try these features out. Tell us, what do you think?
